name: site-montdenis
description: Site Pension et Elevage de Montdenis

scripts.copy: npm run copy:robots && npm run copy:favicon && npm run copy:img
scripts.lint: npm run stylelint && npm run eslint
scripts.html: npm run mustache && npm run html-minify
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run lint && npm run copy && npm run js && npm run style && npm run structure && npm run html
scripts.start: viws-light -directory ${INIT_CWD}/dist -csp "default-src 'self'; base-uri 'self'; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' *.mapbox.com; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/normalize.css@8.0.0/ *.mapbox.com; img-src 'self' data: blob: ; child-src 'self' blob:; worker-src 'self' blob:; connect-src 'self' *.mapbox.com" -headers X-UA-Compatible:ie=edge~content-language:fr
